longDescription:
TV just got a lot more exciting with the Amazon Fire TV Stick Media Streamer. Small and easy to click into place, this simple Fire Stick allows you to combine your favourite TV subscription packages, box sets and more and enjoy them all on the big screen. Rent films, play games, view the news and take advantage of the huge range of internet on-demand subscription providers from Amazon Instant Video to Netflix.

Built for speedy streaming

Get started in seconds with little time spent buffering thanks to the Amazon Fire Stick?s powerful dual-core processor. It also features a dedicated VideoCore4 GPU and a spacious 8GB of storage. TV and movies of up to 1080p HD can be enjoyed in their authentic glory and this is further enhanced by an all-immersive sound boosted by Dolby Digital Plus.

On-demand TV, movies and more

Stream your favourite content services from subscription services like Netflix and Amazon Instant Video to free (with a TV licence) BBC iPlayer and All 4. Get stuck in to a fun, retro game via your Fire TV Stick too, with plenty of downloadable classics available, from Flappy Birds Family to PAC-MAN. The Fire remote also doubles up as a neat games controller.

For parties, or simply because you fancy music over movies, use your Amazon Fire Stick for streaming your favourite tunes. Easily access audio services such as TuneIn and iHeartRadio or even tap in to your Amazon Music Library.

Smart Amazon integration

Amazon has thought of every feature you could need in its Fire TV Stick Media Streamer. Navigate using your remote with ease and enjoy the intelligent nature of the system via the Advanced Streaming and Prediction (ASAP) feature. With ASAP your Amazon Instant Video quickly learns what movies and TV shows you like and lines them up ready for you, next time you switch on. ASAP accuracy improves over time so your favourite shows are always there and waiting.

Amazon has even teamed up with IMDb to create X-Ray which allows you to innovatively pick out actors and songs in any scene during a film. Read character backstories and actor biographies as the movie runs without the need to take your eyes away from the screen. This is a real bonus especially as it can also be used to jump to your favourite scenes or skip the credits.

Set up your Fire Stick in seconds

Power up your Amazon Fire TV Stick, plug it in to your HD TV using the provided HDMI cable, connect to your Wi-Fi and you?re ready to go. ?Fling? your small screen to your big screen with your second-screen-enabled Fire phone or tablet and you can mirror whatever is on the small screen on the big screen, allowing you to keep your mobile device free for other tasks. Mirror any Fire OS or Android device straight to your HD TV.

Get going in no time with the intuitive Amazon Fire Remote or you can opt for the Fire TV Remote App which features voice control for even easier browsing and choosing of your favourite shows, games and more.
